title: Cosmo Sex Position of the Day
creator: Hearst Communications, Inc.

extendedInfo.description: Welcome to Cosmopolitan's to-go version of the Kama Sutra! Whether you're looking for inspiration for a sexy rendevous later tonight or just want to brush up on how to make some classic moves even better, you'll love this collection of sex positions.

reviews.title: Force Closes and is Never Updated
reviews.comment: This app is not worth paying for.  It force closes constantly and has not been updated a single time since I purchased it in August 2010.  Cosmo should be embarrassed to have their name on this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Bummed cause the ad in Cosmo said you can shake phone for random position and it doesn\'t work,guess that\'s only for iPhone? Would\'ve been nice to know
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sucks forcecloses all the time, keeps repeating the same like 20 images. Not worth free nvrmind paying for it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keeps on force close -mytouch 4G- needs to b fix otherwise its interesting :)

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Not practical.  The human body does not bend this way with a yoga instructor body.  Better off just reading Dr. Laura Berman\'s website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: if you read the magazine then u know there is no need for this app. plus caused force shut downs. uninstalled and no more issues.

reviews.comment: I kno cosmo can do better. update please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wish I wouldn\'t have...
reviews.comment: While seeing the positions and having descriptions of them is great (and I am happy there are links to cosmo articles that are relevant), I would not recommend paying for this app. Moving around within it sucks and there really isn\'t a settings menu. You can\'t even favorite the positions. Considering a refund.
reviews.author: TnA Stuart-Smolik

reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY EXCELLENT!!
reviews.comment: if u like Cosmos Mag, then u will LOVE their Daily Sex Positions app.....TRUST ME GIRLFRIENDS, TRUST ME.
